concept.title: Graphics Resource Services Collection
concept.shortdesc: The Graphics Resource Services collection provides an abstraction layer for the memory management of graphics data (which can be pixel data or non-pixel data, such as lists of OpenVG commands).

conbody.p: Variant: ScreenPlay. Target audience: Device creators.
conbody.note: The Graphics Resource component is deprecated in Symbian^3 and will be removed in Symbian^4. However, a new Graphics Resource Interface component is planned for Symbian^4. This new component will provide a similar but reduced API that is optimized for sharing images across processes.
